Original title: Millions
Year: 2004
Length: 98 min.
Country: United Kingdom
Directed by Danny Boyle
Writer: Frank Cottrell Boyce
Music: John Murphy
Photography: Anthony Dod Mantle
Starring: Alexander Nathan Etel, James Nesbitt, Daisy Donovan, Lewis Owen McGibbon, Christopher Fulford, Pearce Quigley, Jane Hogarth
Studio: Pathe Pictures / Fox Searchlight Pictures
Genre: Drama | Children. family film
Official Website: http://www2.foxsearchlight.com/millions/

Synopsis:
---------
After the death of his mother, Anthony, a boy of nine, is shown always pragmatic, while his younger brother Damian, two years his junior, uses imagination, fantasy and faith to acquire his confusing world sense.A bag full of money, out of the blue, goes to Damian 's feet.Thanks to her, the children will live an adventure that will remain etched in his memory imperishable form, because they will understand that the real value of things has nothing to do with money.
